pre_caption: This is a nighttime, long-exposure shot of the Arc de Triomphe in Paris. The iconic monument is brightly lit at the end of a wide, wet road, framed by trees with golden leaves. The long exposure captures the movement of traffic as vibrant streaks of red and white light, creating a dynamic contrast with the static, sharply focused arch.
pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
